ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | symgtrinv.t | |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) |
| 2 |  | symgtrinv.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) |
| 3 |  | symgtrinv.i | |- I = ( invg ` G ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_symggrp | |- ( D e. V -> G e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppG ` G ) = ( oppG ` G ) |

| 11 | 1, 2, 10 | #P_symgtrf | |- T C_ ( Base ` G ) |

| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_ax-mp | |- Word T C_ Word ( Base ` G ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_sseli | |- ( W e. Word T -> W e. Word ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 15 | 10 | #P_gsumwmhm | |- ( ( I e. ( G MndHom ( oppG ` G ) ) /\ W e. Word ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( I ` ( G gsum W ) ) = ( ( oppG ` G ) gsum ( I o. W ) ) ) |
| 16 | 9, 14, 15 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) -> ( I ` ( G gsum W ) ) = ( ( oppG ` G ) gsum ( I o. W ) ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 3 | #P_grpinvf | |- ( G e. Grp -> I : ( Base ` G ) --> ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 18 | 4, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( D e. V -> I : ( Base ` G ) --> ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) -> I : ( Base ` G ) --> ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_wrdf | |- ( W e. Word T -> W : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) --> T ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) -> W : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) --> T ) |
| 22 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( W : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) --> T /\ T C_ ( Base ` G ) ) -> W : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) --> ( Base ` G ) ) |

| 24 |  | #P_fco | |- ( ( I : ( Base ` G ) --> ( Base ` G ) /\ W : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) --> ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( I o. W ) : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) --> ( Base ` G ) ) |

| 26 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( ( I o. W ) : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) --> ( Base ` G ) -> ( I o. W ) Fn ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) |

| 30 |  | #P_fvco2 | |- ( ( W Fn ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) /\ x e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( I o. W ) ` x ) = ( I ` ( W ` x ) ) ) |
| 31 | 29, 30 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) /\ x e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( I o. W ) ` x ) = ( I ` ( W ` x ) ) ) |
| 32 | 21 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) /\ x e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( W ` x ) e. T ) |
| 33 | 11, 32 | #P_sseldi | |- ( ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) /\ x e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( W ` x ) e. ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 34 | 2, 10, 3 | #P_symginv | |- ( ( W ` x ) e. ( Base ` G ) -> ( I ` ( W ` x ) ) = `' ( W ` x ) ) |

| 37 | 36, 1 | #P_pmtrfcnv | |- ( ( W ` x ) e. T -> `' ( W ` x ) = ( W ` x ) ) |
| 38 | 32, 37 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) /\ x e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> `' ( W ` x ) = ( W ` x ) ) |
| 39 | 31, 35, 38 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) /\ x e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( I o. W ) ` x ) = ( W ` x ) ) |
| 40 | 27, 29, 39 | #P_eqfnfvd | |- ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) -> ( I o. W ) = W ) |
| 41 | 40 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) -> ( ( oppG ` G ) gsum ( I o. W ) ) = ( ( oppG ` G ) gsum W ) ) |
| 42 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 43 | 4, 42 | #P_syl | |- ( D e. V -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 44 | 10, 5 | #P_gsumwrev | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ W e. Word ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( ( oppG ` G ) gsum W ) = ( G gsum ( reverse ` W ) ) ) |
